channel.title: developer story on byteloom - Marek Mierzwa
channel.description: Recent content in developer story on byteloom - Marek Mierzwa

item.title: AAPT: Unknown option '--no-version-vectors'
item.description: If you ever encountered the error AAPT: Unknown option '--no-version-vectors' during the Xamarin build you probably found this page looking for a solution.

item.title: Under the hood
item.description: It’s always good to have static code analysis in your build process. I guess no one these days argues with this statement.
